participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, Emily enjoys exploring new places and meeting new people. She has a passion for music and a sweet tooth for chocolate.
participant_1.background: I am from Georgia. I can play the violin. I cannot sing very well. I love chocolate.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and ambitious, Michael is a tech-savvy gamer with a love for online communities. He is open-minded and enjoys sharing his interests with others.
participant_2.background: I am a vegetarian. I will study computer science. I like playing games online. I am on my way to UC Santa Cruz where I was accepted.

content.text: Hi! I'm from Georgia, where are you from?
I'm from California, on my way to UC Santa Cruz where I was accepted to study Computer Science!
Wow, that's awesome! I've never been to California. Are you excited to go?
I'm so excited! I've always wanted to go to school in California.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love playing video games, reading, and watching movies.
I love video games too! Do you play any online multiplayer games?
I play a lot of Call of Duty and League of Legends.
Oh, I've never played either of those games.
You should try them! They're both really fun.
I'll have to check them out.
You can add me on Steam if you want, we can play together sometime.
